top_articles.title: SolarWinds Patches Three Critical Serv-U Vulnerabilities
top_articles.summary: SolarWinds Serv-U is affected by vulnerabilities that can be exploited for remote code execution.

top_articles.title: Microsoft: Windows 10 KB5072653 OOB update fixes ESU install errors
top_articles.summary: Microsoft has released an emergency Windows 10 KB5072653 out-of-band update to resolve ongoing issues with installing the November extended security updates.
